comments.body: Due to a bug in scaladoc, we also need to add ":: DeveloperApi ::" on the line immediately preceding the first line of comments.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -17,11 +17,14 @@
 
 package org.apache.spark
 
+import org.apache.spark.annotation.DeveloperApi
+
 /**
  * An iterator that wraps around an existing iterator to provide task killing functionality.
  * It works by checking the interrupted flag in [[TaskContext]].
  */
-private[spark] class InterruptibleIterator[+T](val context: TaskContext, val delegate: Iterator[T])
+@DeveloperApi
